solution_line_template: She needs {num_drip_coffees} drip coffees that are ${cost_per_drip_coffee} each so {num_drip_coffees}*{cost_per_drip_coffee} = $<<{num_drip_coffees}*{cost_per_drip_coffee}={drip_coffees_cost}>>{drip_coffees_cost}
She needs {num_lattes} lattes that are ${cost_per_latte} each so {num_lattes}*{cost_per_latte} = $<<{num_lattes}*{cost_per_latte}={lattes_cost}>>{lattes_cost}

She needs {num_cold_brews} cold brew coffees that are ${cost_per_cold_brew} each so {num_cold_brews}*{cost_per_cold_brew} = $<<{num_cold_brews}*{cost_per_cold_brew}={cold_brews_cost}>>{cold_brews_cost}

So the drips are ${drip_coffees_cost}, lattes are ${lattes_cost} plus ${syrup_cost} for syrup, cold brew is ${cold_brews_cost}, a double shot for ${double_shot_espresso_cost} and a cappuccino for ${cappuccino_cost} for a total of {drip_coffees_cost}+{lattes_cost}+{syrup_cost}+{cold_brews_cost}+{double_shot_espresso_cost}+{cappuccino_cost} = $<<{drip_coffees_cost}+{lattes_cost}+{syrup_cost}+{cold_brews_cost}+{double_shot_espresso_cost}+{cappuccino_cost}={total_order_cost}>>{total_order_cost}
